mapper.select: SELECT STM.USER_ID ,SU.USER_NAME ,STM.ORGAN_CODE ,CONCAT(SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM, "(", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, " ", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, " ",SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM, ")") AS DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(STM.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MEASURE_DT FROM ST_TEETH_MEASURE STM LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO SDHI ON STM.ORGAN_CODE = SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_USER SU ON STM.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND STM.USER_ID = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{measureStartDt} AND #{measureStartDt}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD ,CONCAT(SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM, "(", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, " ", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, " ",SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM, ")") AS DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ,CASE WHEN SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN IS NULL THEN "N" ELSE "Y" END AS INFORMATION_AGRYN ,DATE_FORMAT(SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT FROM ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO SDHI LEFT JOIN ST_CUSTOMER_MAPPING_INFO SCMI ON SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD = SCMI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD AND SCMI.USER_ID = #{userId} UNION SELECT SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD ,CONCAT(SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM, "(", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, " ", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, " ",SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM, ")") AS DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ,CASE WHEN SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN IS NULL THEN "N" ELSE "Y" END AS INFORMATION_AGRYN ,DATE_FORMAT(SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT FROM ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO SDHI RIGHT JOIN ST_CUSTOMER_MAPPING_INFO SCMI ON SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD = SCMI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD WHERE 1=1 AND SCMI.USER_ID = #{userId} ) A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dentalHospitalNm}, '%')
ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN A.INFORMATION_AGRYN = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN A.INFORMATION_AGRYN = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ), A.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ASC

SELECT SCMI.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD AS DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD ,CONCAT(SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM, "(", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, " ", SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, " ",SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM, ")") AS DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ,SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN AS INFOMATION_AGRYN ,DATE_FORMAT(SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INFORMATION_AGRYN_DT ,SCMI.IS_MEASURE AS IS_MEASURE FROM ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO SDHI LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_CUSTOMER_MAPPING_INFO SCMI ON SDHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD = SCMI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD WHERE 1=1 AND SCMI.INFORMATION_AGRYN = 'Y' AND SCMI.USER_ID = #{userId}
